job_description: We are seeking a DevOps Engineer with 4+ years of experience to join our cloud infrastructure team. Required skills: Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins/GitLab CI), AWS or GCP, Linux system administration, Python for automation (boto3, fabric), and experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana). You will be responsible for managing our production infrastructure, automating deployments, and ensuring 99.9% uptime.
resume_text: Data Scientist with 6 years of experience building ML models and analyzing large-scale datasets. Strong Python programming skills including pandas, scikit-learn, numpy, and matplotlib for statistical analysis and data visualization. Built predictive models for customer churn analysis that improved retention by 15% and developed recommendation systems serving 2M+ users. Experienced with SQL for data extraction and manipulation, Jupyter notebooks for exploratory analysis, and creating executive dashboards in Tableau. Led cross-functional projects with product and engineering teams to deploy ML solutions.

job_description: Senior Site Reliability Engineer position for a fast-growing SaaS company. We need 5+ years of SRE/DevOps experience with strong skills in: Kubernetes orchestration, Terraform infrastructure-as-code, AWS services (EC2, RDS, S3, Lambda), monitoring and alerting tools (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, or similar), incident management, and on-call rotation experience. Must have experience with high-availability systems and disaster recovery planning.
resume_text: DevOps Engineer with 7 years of experience managing production infrastructure for enterprise applications. Expert in Kubernetes (CKA certified), Terraform, AWS (Solutions Architect certified), CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, GitLab CI), Docker, and monitoring with Datadog and Prometheus. Led incident management and response for critical production outages, participated in regular on-call rotations, and designed disaster recovery procedures. Implemented auto-scaling solutions and reduced deployment time by 60%. Strong background in SRE principles including SLIs, SLOs, error budgets, and high-availability architecture.

job_description: Frontend Developer needed for our product team. Must have 3+ years of React experience with TypeScript. Required: React hooks, Redux or Context API, responsive design, modern CSS (Tailwind or styled-components), testing with Jest and React Testing Library, Git workflows, and experience building SPAs. Nice-to-have: Next.js, Webpack configuration, accessibility best practices.
resume_text: Frontend Engineer with 5 years specializing in React and TypeScript. Built multiple production SPAs using React 18 with hooks, Redux Toolkit for state management, and TypeScript for type safety. Strong CSS skills with Tailwind CSS and responsive design principles. Comprehensive testing experience with Jest and React Testing Library (85%+ coverage). Experienced with Next.js for SSR/SSG, Webpack optimization, and WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards. Proficient in Git workflows and code reviews.

job_description: Analytics Engineer role at a data-driven startup. We're looking for someone with 3+ years of experience in data modeling, SQL (advanced), dbt for transformation pipelines, cloud data warehouses (Snowflake or BigQuery), and Python for data analysis. You'll build and maintain our data models, create metrics frameworks, and collaborate with data scientists and business analysts. Experience with data visualization tools (Looker, Tableau) is a plus.
resume_text: Data Engineer with 4 years of experience building data pipelines and analytics infrastructure. Expert in SQL (complex queries, window functions, CTEs), dbt (developed 50+ models), Snowflake data warehouse, Python (pandas, sqlalchemy), and Airflow for orchestration. Designed dimensional models (star/snowflake schemas), implemented metrics layers, and built dashboards in Looker. Strong understanding of data quality, testing, and documentation practices. Experience collaborating with analytics and data science teams.

job_description: Backend Engineer for our core platform team. Required: 5+ years of backend development experience with Java/Kotlin and Spring Boot framework. Must have strong expertise in: microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL or MySQL, Kafka or RabbitMQ message queues, Docker and Kubernetes deployment, Redis caching, and JUnit testing. Experience with distributed systems and high-traffic applications is essential.
resume_text: Full-Stack Developer with 6 years of experience focused on frontend technologies and Node.js backend development. Built backend-for-frontend (BFF) services using TypeScript with Express.js and NestJS frameworks. Strong experience with RESTful API design and implementation, PostgreSQL and MongoDB databases, JWT authentication and authorization, and Docker containerization for local development. Developed monolithic backend-for-frontend services that handle API aggregation and data transformation for React applications. Proficient in Node.js ecosystem including npm, async/await patterns, and middleware design.

job_description: Machine Learning Engineer to build and deploy ML systems at scale. Required: 4+ years of ML engineering experience (not data science), strong Python programming, deep learning frameworks (PyTorch or TensorFlow), MLOps practices (MLflow, Kubeflow, model versioning), Kubernetes for model deployment, Docker, CI/CD for ML pipelines, and experience with model monitoring and A/B testing in production. Must have experience training, optimizing, and serving models in production environments.
resume_text: Marketing Manager with 8 years of experience leading digital marketing campaigns and content strategy for B2B SaaS companies. Managed social media campaigns across multiple platforms and developed content calendars that increased engagement by 40%. Proficient in marketing automation tools, campaign analytics using Google Analytics, and metrics tracking in Excel. Utilized AI-powered content generation tools including ChatGPT, Jasper, and Midjourney to scale content production and improve creative workflows. Completed an online machine learning fundamentals course on Coursera covering basic concepts of supervised learning and neural networks.

job_description: Senior Backend Engineer for our payments infrastructure team. We need 6+ years of experience with: Go programming language (primary stack), gRPC for service communication, PostgreSQL and Redis, Kubernetes deployment and management, distributed tracing (Jaeger, OpenTelemetry), event-driven architecture, and high-throughput systems (100k+ req/sec). Must have experience with payment processing, financial transactions, or similar critical systems requiring strong consistency guarantees.
resume_text: Senior Backend Engineer with 7 years of experience building scalable APIs and microservices for high-traffic consumer applications. Strong expertise in Python using Flask and FastAPI frameworks, and Node.js with Express. Extensive experience with PostgreSQL database design and optimization, MongoDB for document storage, and Redis for caching and session management. Built RESTful APIs serving millions of requests daily with 99.95% uptime. Proficient in Docker containerization and AWS services including Lambda, ECS, and RDS. Some exposure to Kubernetes for deployment and container orchestration. Familiar with event-driven architecture patterns including pub/sub and message queues.

job_description: Data Engineer for our analytics platform. Required: 4+ years of data engineering experience with strong skills in: Apache Spark (PySpark), cloud data warehouses (Snowflake or Databricks), Python, SQL, Airflow or Prefect for orchestration, data quality frameworks, and experience building large-scale batch and streaming ETL pipelines. Must have experience optimizing Spark jobs, partitioning strategies, and working with petabyte-scale data. AWS or GCP experience required.
resume_text: Data Scientist with 5 years of experience in predictive modeling, statistical analysis, and working with large datasets. Proficient in Python including pandas for data manipulation, scikit-learn for machine learning, and statsmodels for statistical modeling. Expert in SQL with experience writing complex queries, joins, and aggregations to extract and analyze data from relational databases. Developed Python scripts for automated data extraction and transformation workflows. Experience with data visualization using matplotlib, seaborn, and Tableau for business reporting. Worked with large datasets spanning millions of records and implemented basic ETL workflows in Python. Familiar with AWS fundamentals including S3 for data storage and EC2 for compute resources.

job_description: Senior Backend Engineer to lead our microservices migration. We're looking for 7+ years of backend development experience with demonstrated technical leadership. Required: Expert-level proficiency in distributed systems, microservices architecture patterns, AWS services (ECS, Lambda, RDS, SQS, SNS), Docker and container orchestration, API gateway design, database optimization (PostgreSQL, DynamoDB), and experience mentoring junior engineers. Must have led architecture decisions, written technical design docs, and managed cross-team projects.
resume_text: Backend Engineer with 4 years of experience building web applications and RESTful APIs. Solid skills in Python using Django and Flask frameworks, PostgreSQL database design and query optimization, and Redis for caching. Experienced with AWS basics including EC2, S3, and RDS for application hosting and data storage. Built authentication and authorization systems using JWT tokens and OAuth2. Proficient in Docker for containerization and local development environments. Worked with microservices concepts alongside primarily monolithic applications. Contributed to API design and implementation for applications serving thousands of concurrent users.

job_description: Senior Security Engineer to lead our application security program. Required: 6+ years of security engineering experience with deep expertise in: application security (OWASP Top 10), threat modeling, security code review, SAST/DAST tools (SonarQube, Checkmarx, Burp Suite), penetration testing, security architecture design, compliance frameworks (SOC 2, ISO 27001), and incident response. Must have experience leading security assessments, defining security standards, and collaborating with development teams to remediate vulnerabilities. Strong knowledge of cryptography, authentication protocols (OAuth2, SAML), and cloud security (AWS IAM, security groups).
resume_text: Backend Software Engineer with 5 years of experience building secure web applications and APIs. Implemented OAuth2 authentication flows and JWT token-based authorization systems for multi-tenant applications. Configured HTTPS/TLS for secure communication and certificate management. Added input validation, parameterized SQL queries to prevent injection attacks, and implemented rate limiting for API endpoints. Read OWASP documentation and applied secure coding practices including proper password hashing, session management, and CSRF protection. Completed an online web application security course covering common vulnerabilities and defensive programming techniques. Participated in security code reviews and addressed vulnerability findings from security scanning tools.
